meanings.definition: A group or set of eight.
meanings.sent1: The ogdoad of crayons in the box was perfect for my art project.
meanings.sent2: She counted an ogdoad of apples in the basket.
meanings.sent3: The ogdoad of puppies running around the yard was a delightful sight.
meanings.sent4: The ogdoad of planets in our solar system fascinates astronomers.
meanings.sent5: The ogdoad of keys on the keychain jingled as she walked.

meanings.sent1: The clock struck eight times, signaling the ogdoad of the hour.
meanings.sent2: An ogdoad of legs scurried across the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent3: The ogdoad of cupcakes on the plate disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The ogdoad of sides on an octagon makes it a unique shape.
meanings.sent5: She won the game by rolling an ogdoad on the dice.

meanings.definition: A group of eight deities worshipped together in ancient Egyptian religion.
meanings.sent1: The ancient temple housed an ogdoad of revered gods.
meanings.sent2: Priests performed rituals to honor the ogdoad of deities.
meanings.sent3: The ogdoad of statues in the temple seemed to come alive at night.
meanings.sent4: Legends spoke of the ogdoad's power to bring blessings to the people.
meanings.sent5: The pharaoh prayed to the ogdoad for guidance in times of need.
